Key Match Events: The Golden State Warriors defeated the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday night by a final score of 123-118.
Draymond Green had a controversial foul on Zach Edey that was later upgraded to a Flagrant 1 after league review.
Post-Match Reflections: Grizzlies head coach Taylor Jenkins expressed disappointment with the officiating, particularly regarding the foul by Draymond Green.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The win improved Golden State to 10-2 on the season, placing them just a half-game behind the Oklahoma City Thunder for the top spot in the Western Conference.
This was the second-straight loss for the Grizzlies, dropping them to 7-6 on the season.
